programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1002
programme.desc: Pups Save a High-Flying Hen / Pups Save a Sloth - After Chickaletta accidentally takes flight on a toy airplane, it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue her. // Mayor Humdinger mistakes a sloth for a monkey. He races the Paw Patrol to find it when it goes missing to cover up his blunder.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Mummy Pig's Birthday - It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Tooth Fairy - Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep123
programme.desc: The New Car - The family car breaks down, so Peppa and her family rent a new one, but it starts acting crazy

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Photo - Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep106
programme.desc: We Love Nature - Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! A thunder makes things worse. Luckily, Anna's living room makes a great camp site!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Jukebox / Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire - Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records. // A hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go awry sending her careening down Jake's Mountain

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Lemonade Stand / The Crew Builds A Wildlife Bridge - After the Crew builds a special lemonade stand for Lucas and Lily, a sour Speed Meister sends it rolling through Builder Cove! // Why does Crunchy the beaver cross the road? Because Rubble & Crew build a bridge to help him get to the other side!

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Nubble trouble / Bouncing Boulders - Bobbi befriends a hungry alien he calls 'Nubble', but things soon go wrong after she eats junk aboard the Deer Squad's space station. // Kai and Lola compete to set a mountain climbing record but disturbs some giant boulders on Frost Mountain.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Paddington and the Unlikely Hero / Paddington Needs a Hero - Who's the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens and why do they want to remain anonymous? // Paddington finds a four-legged hero when he gets stuck in an igloo at the winter festival.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: PupsSolve the Mystery of the Missing Art - When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep925
programme.desc: Pups Save the Baby Space Rocks / Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys - When a mysterious storm drops hailstones that hatch into Baby Space Rocks, the Pups must find a way to keep them safe. // A 3-D printer leads to trouble when Eddie and Emmy make 3-D reproductions of themselves and play pranks all over Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep120
programme.desc: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case - There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue...and build a brand new Science Center to help investigate.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Birthdaze / Squid N' Playl / Board to Tears - Bossy comes up with a plan to celebrate his birthday every day. // Bossy and Turtle invite Saddiq to take part in International Bestie Day traditions. // When Turtle gets a new skateboard, he's too scared to use it when Bossy has an accident.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Nacho Supreme / Sea Cow - Toms's new pet friend, Nacho, shows off his special skills when the crew goes on a daring rescue mission to save Kiko. // The crew must stop Bonnie Bones' latest quest for treasure when she disrupts a manatee habitat with a sticky invention.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Magic Spyglass - Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Treasure Hunt - Grandpa Pig hides some treasure in his garden, and when Peppa and George come, they have to look for it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Not Very Well - Peppa has chicken pox, and has to stay in bed until she gets better.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep127
programme.desc: Windy Castle - Peppa and her family go to the Windy Castle, and when they get there, they have a wonderful view from the top.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep128
programme.desc: My Cousin Chlo - Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep129
programme.desc: Pancakes - Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Babysitting - Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Super Wheels vs. The Green Queen - The Green Queen is turning everything in Axle City... green! Luckily Blaze, Watts, and Darington can transform into superheroes! Can they stop The Green Queen before Axle City is one color forever?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep605
programme.desc: Race to Sky High Mountain - At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep926
programme.desc: Charger Visits the Pups / Pups Save a Shiny Ride - Rubble's cousin, Charger, visits Adventure Bay just in time to help out when a Humdinger-caused geyser destroys Mr. Porter's cafe. // Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a "Shinest Ride Contest", so it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1001
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wacky Water Skiers / Pups Save the Mayor's Assistant - When Emmy and Eddie take a joyride, Hurricane Harrigan and Cap'n Turbot get caught water skiing behind the out of- control boat. // Daring Danny X becomes Mayor Humdinger's assistant, and builds a theme park! A jealous Humdinger sabotages the rides.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Swimming Solo - Mommy Shark demonstrates a power that blows Baby away, sending him on a journey to find the same superpower within: Self-soothing!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Paddington's Favourite Hero / Paddington And The Skateboarder - Paddington struggles to choose a hero for a special photo wall in the park - maybe he needs to look closer to home. // Paddington becomes a heroic skateboarder, thanks to Mateo and a special mask - but how magical is the mask?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Blue's Mystery Present - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest--whoever correctly guesses the mystery present on display gets to unwrap it! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what's inside this super special gift, and help customers pick out the perfect presents.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Super Wheels vs. The Green Queen - The Green Queen is turning everything in Axle City... green! Luckily Blaze, Watts, and Darington can transform into superheroes! Can they stop The Green Queen before Axle City is one color forever?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Mother's Day on the High Seas / Bonnie's Bones - It's the Annual Mother's Day Race and Santi is competing with Mami, but Enrique plans to cheat his way to victory. // Bonnie must steal an epic treasure to receive a family heirloom, but she keeps getting thwarted by the Pirate Protectors!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Pick and Chew / Mr. Bossy and Mr. Turtle / Dance Like Everyone's Watching - Bossy, Turtle and Bissy are overwhelmed when Mom and Dad let them order at a pizza place. // Miss Elky lets Bossy and Turtle take over for the day. // Turtle is afraid to dance in front of a huge crowd.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1002
programme.desc: Pups Save a High-Flying Hen / Pups Save a Sloth - After Chickaletta accidentally takes flight on a toy airplane, it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue her. // Mayor Humdinger mistakes a sloth for a monkey. He races the Paw Patrol to find it when it goes missing to cover up his blunder.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep132
programme.desc: Thunderstorm - Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1004
programme.desc: Pups Save a Windswept Polar Bear Cub / Pups Save a Drive-in - When a storm sends a polar bear cub to Adventure Bay, it's up to Ryder, Everest, and the pups to bring the baby bear back to its family. // The Pups must save Mayor Humdinger from a runaway movie projector at the new drive-in.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Space Station Mystery / Crystal Cracks - Strange things begin happening on board the space station. Deer Squad investigates and discovers there is a prankster on board - Trickalien! // Jade discovers a Time Crystal and she is forced to learn how to use it to turn back time!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Paddington's Goo Monster / Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure - Paddington makes Goo but can he keep his promise to not make a mess when thngs get out of control? // Paddington and Simi go on a magical journey into the human body to see if an apple pip grows into a tree if you swallow one.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1005
programme.desc: Pups Save Their Digi Tal Friends / Pups Save the Rainbow - The Paw Patrol must save the day when two helpful robots take on more than they can handle. // In a dream, Mayor Humdinger finds a Prism that makes rainbows and drains Adventure Bay of color. It's up to the pups to restore color to Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Card Days Night / Boom Boom Super Regret / A Tight Squeeze - Bossy must learn to be less over the top when making cards for his friends // Bossy has an opportunity to trade away all his toys for one of Chipper's toys // Turtle worries he'll be the reason his team loses a relay race.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Lost & Flounder / Rumble in the Jungle - Lorelai accidentally loses a magical Merlandian artifact and learns how to stay calm in order to recover it from Pepito. // When Bonnie Bones steals Enrique's ship, he begrudgingly works with the Pirate Protectors to get it back.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Stone of Life - Santi and crew follow a map to a special treasure, but Bonnie and Sir Butterscotch are hot on their trail.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Very Hot Day - It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep141
programme.desc: Chloe's Puppet Show - Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep142
programme.desc: Daddy Gets Fit - Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep143
programme.desc: Tidying Up - Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Playground - Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Puts Up a Picture - Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Super Wheels vs. Pancakeio - When Pancakeio the Pancake Wizard takes all the pancakes in Axle City, it's up to Blaze, Stripes, and Starla to become superheroes! Using their Super Wheels, they've got to get those pancakes back- just in time for breakfast!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Puppy Chase! - When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Pups Find a Genie / Pups Save a Tightrope Walker - Rubble finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes! // Francois Turbot is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act. Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Pups Save a Goldrush / Pups Save the Paw Patroller - When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, its a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush! // When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the Paw Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow / Blizzard Wizard - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. // When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Old Shark Bride - Baby gets carried away when he helps Grandma and Grandpa plan their vow renewal ceremony.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lake Monster / Paddington's Space Radio - Mr Curry is sure there is a monster in the park lake and Paddington sets out to help him prove it. // It's Father's Day but how will Toq let her Dad know she is thinking of him all the way up in Space? Maybe the Browns can help?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Magenta's Thank You Day Surprise - It's Thank You Day and our friends Miranda and Magenta are coming over to celebrate! When Magenta's picture of what she's thankful for gets ruined, we play a special game of Magenta's Clues to figure out what she's thankful for!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Super Wheels vs. Pancakeio - When Pancakeio the Pancake Wizard takes all the pancakes in Axle City, it's up to Blaze, Stripes, and Starla to become superheroes! Using their Super Wheels, they've got to get those pancakes back- just in time for breakfast!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Sky Pirates Pt 1 - Our crew works together to help a knight find his sword. For helping him, they get the last Medallion and are shown a map to a sky land! El Bravo sprouts wings and takes them to Celestia where a Queen enlists their help stopping a band of jesters.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Battle of the Besties / When Lemons Give You a Mess / Do the Kite Thing - Bossy and Turtle learn how to compete against each other. // Bossy and Turtle learn how to open and run a lemonade stand. // Bossy tries to make a traditional kite.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pups Save the Soccer Game / Pups Save a Lucky Collar - Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play. // The Paw Patrol must work as a team to overcome some dirty tricks by Mayor Humdinger and pull out a victory!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep146
programme.desc: At the Beach - Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Tree House - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep138
programme.desc: Fancy Dress Party - Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep139
programme.desc: The Museum - Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Kite - While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Nap - Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep and they each offer their own unique way to do it!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1004
programme.desc: Pups Save a Windswept Polar Bear Cub / Pups Save a Drive-in - When a storm sends a polar bear cub to Adventure Bay, it's up to Ryder, Everest, and the pups to bring the baby bear back to its family. // The Pups must save Mayor Humdinger from a runaway movie projector at the new drive-in.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep84
programme.desc: Musical Statues - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po enjoy a game of musical statues. It takes the Teletubbies a few turns to work out what to do when the music stops; they must stand very still.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Monkey - Dee encourages a friend to say 'monkey' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of monkeys - a furry monkey, a swinging monkey, a jumping monkey and a funky monkey!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Big Sister Day - Hooper plans a special surprise party for Phoebe. But can Hooper finish the preparations and give his big sister a party to remember?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Tiny Sandwiches - Messy joins Zim and his friends on a mission inside a sandwich to photograph some atoms for Mayor Oki... Everyone say cheese!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep56
programme.desc: Bath Night - Monty is avoiding taking a bath and wonders if you really need to get wet to get clean.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Muffin Cone - When Muffin can't stop sucking her thumb, she has to wear a cone of shame. But the cone gets in her way and she can no longer play `sandwich shop' with Bluey and Bingo.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Shape Badge - It is a lovely day and the squirrels are playing outside. They are playing the shape game. Working out which shape goes where is quite tricky.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep2
programme.desc: The Whistling Badge - When Egg, the cheeky little chick, goes on the run again, Duggee whistles to get him back. Hang on a minute Duggee, what was that noise? A whistle? The squirrels want to learn how to whistle.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Making Music Badge - When the squirrels find Duggee playing saxophone, they want to have a go too. Several pots, balloons, tins, water and tubes later and the squirrels are making music. And boy, are they loud!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep37
programme.desc: Mars Mission, Chile - Xuli and Foz help NASA after a close encounter with a UFO makes them lose the Mars Rover.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep36
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Around The World In 80 Days - It's a rainy day and the team are stuck inside, so Foz reads them his favourite book: Around the World in 80 Days by Jules Verne. The Go Jetters are soon imagining they are characters from the story.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Bin Night - Bluey, Bingo and Dad always take out the bins. Over a few weeks, Bingo tells Dad about a new kid at kindy who is mean to her and Mum offers some good advice.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Octopus - When Chloe tries to teach her dad to improvise and play Bluey's game of Octopus at home, he finds it hard to understand or enjoy, until they both realize they can play it their own way.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Andy and the Chinstrap Penguins - Andy blasts off in his safari sub to Antarctica in search of chinstrap penguin chicks.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Stand-up Machines - Grace shows off three amazing machines that you have to Stand-Up on! Grace goes rides an Electric Surfboard and shows us a Jet Hoverboard.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S6 Ep18
programme.desc: Fishy Mud - The salty sea air is irritating Cook and Line's skin, but Captain HeyHo has a solution: fishy mud. Her remedy comes with an unfortunate downside though - an awful smell!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep19
programme.desc: The Art Badge - The Squirrels learn about different types of art and what inspires it, while preparing their own pieces for Tino the artistic mouse's Woodland Biennale.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep18
programme.desc: The History Badge - The Squirrels get a very interactive history lesson from Duggee and a host of famous faces from the past!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep17
programme.desc: The Sharing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between everyone equally.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep35
programme.desc: The Blarney Stone, Ireland - Kyan has to use some smooth talking to save the tourists and protect Blarney Castle.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Stop Those Superweeds - Some fast-growing plants that don't belong on Academy Island are in danger of taking over. Can the Go Jetters stop the superweed from damaging the Academy and Grim HQ?

programme.desc: Lunar Eclipzzz - Nelly has to help Nora stay awake long enough to see the Lunar eclipse.

programme.desc: Drip Drip Drip - It's a rainy day and Logi-Po just wants to sit quietly and look at a book - but first he's got to stop that drip, drip, drip!

We take you on a deep dive into the history of women in the metal scene and highlight bands and singers such as Doro Pesch, Burning Witches, Slave to Sirens or Nervosa. What were the first female metal bands? What prejudices do the bands face? Is Metal really a safe space?

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Pound for Pound Powerhouses - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep911TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured the first title defense of newly crowned light heavyweight champion Glover Teixeira against surging contender Jiri Prochazka. See both men train and prepare for their battle for the belt in Singapore.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep506TrevorWittmanatUFC268RVCAAnthonySmith
programme.desc: Trevor Wittman gives his account of the UFC's historic return to Madison Square Garden for UFC 268. We discover the history of the famed RVCA gym in Costa Mesa, California. And Anthony 'Lionheart' Smith shares his thoughts on the UFC light heavyweight division

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC289NunesvsAldana
programme.desc: Mexico's Irene Aldana challenges Brazils Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289. Plus, its a clash at lightweight as former champ Charles Oliveira battles Beneil Dariush. See the entire main card, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep10
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep10
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Black History Month Incredible Knockouts - UFC Ultimate Knockouts brings you some of the most devastating finishes ever seen inside the Octagon. From one-punch knockouts to highlight reel kicks, youll see the UFCs biggest names in their most memorable performance.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC284MakhachevvsVolkanovski
programme.desc: At UFC 284, featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski sought a new challenge and a second belt by challenging lightweight champion Islam Makhachev. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their title bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: MotoGP : Qatar Airways Grand Prix of Qatar Highlights
programme.desc: MotoGP : Qatar Airways Grand Prix of Qatar Highlights - Located in the Qatari desert, the Lusail circuit held its first event at the venue with the October 2004 Grand Prix of Qatar, won by Sete Gibernau. In 2008 Qatar celebrated the first floodlit Grand Prix in the history of the MotoGP World Championship and since 2007 Qatar has also hosted the season-opening race on the GP calendar

programme.title: 2023-2024 KOVO V-League Women
programme.desc: RED SPARKS VS PINK SPIDERS - The 20th season of the KOVO V-League Women sees reigning champions EX Hi-pass defend their title against six fellow professional volleyball teams for the coveted championship in South Korea.

programme.title: Ligue 1: Top 10 Goals
programme.desc: Ligue 1: Top 10 Goals - Power, precision, perfection. Ligue 1s top 10 goals of 22/23 were of the highest order.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Tuivasa vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the UFCs hardest punchers returns to the Octagon on March 17, as Australian knockout artist Tai Tuivasa travels to the APEX in Las Vegas to tackle fellow top ten heavyweight contender Marcin Tybura. Packing some significant power in his own right, Polands Tybura has won seven of his last nine en route to his showdown with fan favorite Bam Bam, who has ended his last five victories, including wins over Derrick Lewis and Augusto Sakai, via knockout

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Tuivasa vs. Tybura
programme.desc: Main Event - One of the UFCs hardest punchers returns to the Octagon on March 17, as Australian knockout artist Tai Tuivasa travels to the APEX in Las Vegas to tackle fellow top ten heavyweight contender Marcin Tybura. Packing some significant power in his own right, Polands Tybura has won seven of his last nine en route to his showdown with fan favorite Bam Bam, who has ended his last five victories, including wins over Derrick Lewis and Augusto Sakai, via knockout

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1002UsmanvsCovington2
programme.desc: UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Prelims - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. But on March 9 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida, Suga Sean will face a tough challenge in his first title defense when he meets the only man to beat him, top contender Marlon Chito Vera, in the main event of UFC 299. Ecuadors Vera earned his shot at a world championship with wins over the likes of Frankie Edgar, Rob Font, Dominick Cruz and Pedro Munhoz, but in the three years since they first fought, OMalley has taken his game to new levels, and he is eager to even the score in a high stakes title fight that will have the world watching.

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Main Event - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. But on March 9 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida, Suga Sean will face a tough challenge in his first title defense when he meets the only man to beat him, top contender Marlon Chito Vera, in the main event of UFC 299. Ecuadors Vera earned his shot at a world championship with wins over the likes of Frankie Edgar, Rob Font, Dominick Cruz and Pedro Munhoz, but in the three years since they first fought, OMalley has taken his game to new levels, and he is eager to even the score in a high stakes title fight that will have the world watching.

programme.desc: An enhanced replay of the sports biggest fights, featuring never-before-seen footage from specialty cams.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC284MakhachevvsVolkanovski
programme.desc: At UFC 284, featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski sought a new challenge and a second belt by challenging lightweight champion Islam Makhachev. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their title bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: MotoGP : Qatar Airways Grand Prix of Qatar Highlights
programme.desc: MotoGP : Qatar Airways Grand Prix of Qatar Highlights - Located in the Qatari desert, the Lusail circuit held its first event at the venue with the October 2004 Grand Prix of Qatar, won by Sete Gibernau. In 2008 Qatar celebrated the first floodlit Grand Prix in the history of the MotoGP World Championship and since 2007 Qatar has also hosted the season-opening race on the GP calendar

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep11
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep11
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
